25.eng-name: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: If anyone seeks the office of judge among Muslims till he gets it and his justice prevails over his tyranny, he will go to Paradise; but the man whose tyranny prevails over his justice will go to Hell

chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Judge Who Is Mistaken
